mutants.code:
def reverse_array(arr):
    left = 1
    right = len(arr) - 1
    while left < right:
        (arr[left], arr[right]) = (arr[right], arr[left])
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return arr

def reverse_array(arr):
    left = -1
    right = len(arr) - 1
    while left < right:
        (arr[left], arr[right]) = (arr[right], arr[left])
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return arr
